title: Luma Arcade
text:
Luma Arcade was a <a href="video%20game%20developer">video game developer</a> with origins in <a href="South%20Africa">South Africa</a>.
History.
Luma Arcade was a developer of video games from 2006 to 2013. Initially a division of Luma Studios, a South African animation services provider, Luma Arcade was later spun out as an independent company with staff in San Francisco, <a href="Johannesburg">Johannesburg</a>, and <a href="Portland%2C%20Oregon">Portland</a> before being acquired in a private sale in 2013 to an undisclosed buyer.
